attributes.action: Give State Pension to elderly in line with average wages,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the rounds of prices for utilities  and food increase by given percentages we receive just the one increase.An extra £6.00 p.w. for a married couple.With  Council tax allowance of £100 p.a. scrapped the increase is £4.00 p.w.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
